sentences.english: It puts forward new demands to domestic energy efficiency chillers.

sentences.english: The total design of the modularized Air-cooled heat pump micro-computer controller .

sentences.english: Selection of high-efficiency centrifugal water chillers with systems approach;

sentences.english: Along with the decrease of the indoor load, the COP of the cooling water units has a trend to arise.
sentences.chinese: 随着室内负荷的减小，冷水机组能效比有升高的趋势。

sentences.english: And libr absorption refrigeration compression conveying rate in cold water chiller mainly use.

sentences.english: Presents two common heat recovery methods for water cooling chillers .

sentences.english: Analyses the impact of chilled water temperature on COP of chillers.
sentences.chinese: 分析了冷水温度对冷水机组COP的影响。

sentences.english: Used in large, low pressure centrifugal chillers.
